title: Setting up a new source in Segment
content: To set up a new source in Segment, go to the Sources tab, click Add Source, and follow the configuration steps.

title: Creating a user profile in mParticle
content: To create a user profile in mParticle, ensure the SDK is integrated, then call the 'Identify' API with user details.

title: Building an audience segment in Lytics
content: Navigate to the Segments section in Lytics, click Create Segment, define rules, and save.

title: Integrating data with Zeotap
content: To integrate data with Zeotap, use the API or platform UI to upload datasets and configure mapping.
